ComicInfo.Title: Consecutive Translation; Goofed-Up Genes; How I Rebuilt My Punk Lawn; Saturday Night in India; When the Super-Jets Take Over...; Man Hole; Cracked's Time Capsule for the 1960s; Cracked Looks at Hospitals; The Electric Shave; Let's Travel Down Under... and Take a Cracked's-Eye View of Australia; Cracked Looks at Hunting and Fishing; Riding a Kite; Cornship of Oddie's Father; More Crazy Comebacks; Cracked's Illustrated History; The History of Inflation; Status Symbols for Dogs!; Snappy Answers!
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Humorous story.
Hudd and Dini make a giant kite to carry them over the wall but the guard rides with them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:41:41. [Issue ID 250447]
